QuestData.Title: Find the Deserter
QuestData.Description: I get the feeling that all the pieces are here, but I just can't put them together in a way that makes sense.$B$BI think our best lead is to attempt to locate this deserter. If he left his comrades at the camp, there's a chance you might be able to persuade him to help us understand what the dark conclave arakkoa are planning.$B$BStart your search for him along the road in Magma Fields to the northwest. It seems a likely place for him to take refuge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Parshah in the Magma Fields and speak to him.
QuestData.RewardText: <The arakkoa cackles.>$B$BYes, I am the deserter mentioned in the commander's journal. I have been waiting for the day when others might recognize the threat posed by those I once called brothers.
